description: Learn about rockets and how to build them !

infos.title: Rocket Station
infos.description: One of the first block you need, is the Rocket Station. This allow you to build the rocket with all the parts needed.

infos.title: Rocket Model
infos.description: You can upgrade your rocket model with different Model. [br] [br]

infos.title: Tiny Rocket Model
infos.description: This is the basic rocket. [br] [br] Can transport 1 entity

infos.title: Small Rocket Model
infos.description: This is the small rocket. [br] [br] Can transport 2 entity
